ld_wrd_lst

protected static java.util.ArrayList<Analysed_words> ld_wrd_lst()
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
Private method parsing the blacklist of words. Subsequently it compares the passed word to the word word parameter if it finds the word in the black list it will add it to the list as an analysed_word type

Returns:
returns the loaded blacklist of analysed words
Throws:
java.io.IOException
